articles.content:
Chrome Canary is the most experimental release channel for the Google Chrome web browser. It may be prone to crashing, but is generally safe to use on your PC or Android phone.

articles.author: Alan Friedman - Mobile Tech News Journalist
articles.title: Man receives his Pixel Fold early, says one feature alone is worth the switch from Samsung - PhoneArena
articles.description: A lucky man in the U.K. received his Pixel Fold a few days early and shared his impression of the device on Reddit.
